name: HMIS MCH 006: Integrated Maternity Register
description: Admission into a clinic for a pregnant woman to give birth

sections.label: WHO Clinical Stage / CD4 / Viral Load

answers.label: 1st Time: Client counselled and tested for the first time during this pregnancy
Re-Attd: Client with a Known HIV status from a previous ANC Attendance not eligible for a re-test in maternity
Retest: Client  re-tested for HIV during this visit
Known POS: Clients with a known HIV positive status who did not attend Antenantal from any health facility
1st Time: Client counselled and tested for the first time during this pregnancy
Re-Attd: Client with a Known HIV status from a previous ANC Attendance not eligible for a re-test in maternity
Retest: Client  re-tested for HIV during this visit
Known POS: Clients with a known HIV positive status who did not attend Antenantal from any health facility
New - Client Initiated on ART for eMTCT on this visit
Known ART - Client already on HAART prior to ANC first visit
Refill - Revisiting HIV Positive client already on ART
CTX - Mother initiated/prescribed CTX on this visit
CTX √ - Mother initiated on and given a refill on this visit

sections.label: Syphilis and Hep B Test Results

answers.label: Rx-1: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and completed treatment but not eligible for a test this pregnancy
Rx-2: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and did not receive or complete treatment, not eligible for a test this pregnancy but initiated on treatment at this contact
RX-3: Tested Positive for syphilis and initiated on syphilis treatment
+Ve-K: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and did not receive or complete treatment at this contact but not initiated on treatment
+Ve: Tested Positive for syphilis but not initiated on treatment
-Ve: Tested for syphilis and the results are negative
NR: Client not tested for syphilis at this visit
P: Eligible for prophylaxis and initiated on ARVs
NP: Eligible for prophylaxis but not initiated on ARVs
LT-Rx: Eligible for life long treatment and treated
LTN: Eligible for life long treatment but not treated
NE: Not Eligible for prophylaxis or lifelong treatment
Rx-1: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and completed treatment but not eligible for a test this pregnancy
Rx-2: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and did not receive or complete treatment, not eligible for a test this pregnancy but initiated on treatment at this contact
RX-3: Tested Positive for syphilis and initiated on syphilis treatment
+Ve-K: Tested Positive for syphilis within the past 1 year and did not receive or complete treatment at this contact but not initiated on treatment
+Ve: Tested Positive for syphilis but not initiated on treatment
-Ve: Tested for syphilis and the results are negative
NR: Client not tested for syphilis at this visit
P: Eligible for prophylaxis and initiated on ARVs
NP: Eligible for prophylaxis but not initiated on ARVs
LT-Rx: Eligible for life long treatment and treated
LTN: Eligible for life long treatment but not treated
NE: Not Eligible for prophylaxis or lifelong treatment

questions.label: Active Management of 3rd Stage of Labour
Specify Other Management Procedure for Complications

answers.label: SS - Baby breathes after Stimulation and or Sunction procedure
BM - Baby breathes after Bag and Mask procedure
BMD - Baby dies after Bag and Mask procedure

questions.label: Baby breastfed within the first Hour
New born injected with Vitamin K

answers.label: New - Never Used a modern FP method before
Revisit - Used a modern FP method before
